original_title: My Echo My Shadow and Me
overview: Klong Toey is the largest slum community in Thailand. In 2020, This slum community will be  developed into a new business centre of Bangkok. Poy, Kwang and Boss are kids who are  affected by this mega change. This movie portrays their lives, dreams and community problems  through their interviews and photographs before their home will soon to be evicted.
title: My Echo My Shadow and Me
